import pandas as pd
pd.plotting.register_matplotlib_converters()
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
%matplotlib inline
import seaborn as sns
print("Setup Complete")

happy_filepath_2021 = "../input/world-happiness-report-2021/world-happiness-report-2021.csv"
happy_filepath_old = "../input/world-happiness-report-2021/world-happiness-report.csv"
happy_2021 = pd.read_csv(happy_filepath_2021)
happy_old = pd.read_csv(happy_filepath_old)

import warnings
warnings.filterwarnings("ignore")

media_Qualidade_Vida = happy_old.groupby('Country name')['Life Ladder'].mean().nlargest(10)
fig = plt.figure(figsize=(15,10))
#top_5 = df1.groupby('Country name')['Life Ladder'].mean().nlargest(5)
plt.title("Índice de qualidade de vida dos 10 melhores países",family='Serif', weight='bold', size=20)
my_plot = sns.lineplot(data=happy_old[happy_old['Country name'].isin(media_Qualidade_Vida.index)], x='year',y='Life Ladder',hue='Country name')
